abilities.description: Your holodeck helps you practice and prepare. Declare a path asset you are training for, and set your training cycle to 0. Once per journey when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3ff03b51f620ab26]{Undertake an Expedition}, you may train in the holodeck. If you do, roll +integrity or +an appropriate stat. On a hit, take +1 training cycle. When your training cycle is at 4 and you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d602da2ce0c05f2c]{Advance} to gain or upgrade the declared asset, it costs -1 XP. Then, set your training cycle to zero and declare a new path asset.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.13b2d777c6fb719d]{Gather Information} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.a2d7793b23c17489]{Secure an Advantage} by talking to a holographic facsimile of an expert, add +1.
When you take time for yourself and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.c2c2f31f564caa06]{Hearten} using a favorite recreational program, add +1.
